data.price: Waɗanda ke sauraren* magana, sa'an nan su bi mafi kyaunta. waɗancan sũ ne Allah Ya shiryar da su, kuma waɗancan su ne mãsu hankali,
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحۡسَنَهُۥٓۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
data.footnotes: * Bãyin Allah na ƙwarai sũ ne waɗanda suke saurãren maganar Allah, sa'an nan su yi aiki da abin da yake mai bayyanannar ma'ana daga gare ta, kuma su bar abin da ba su gãne ma'anarsa ba bãyan sun yi ĩmãni da shi cewa daga Allah yake, kuma su tsarkake Allah daga abin da ba ya sifantuwa da Shi na sũrõrin hãlittarSa.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yastamiʿūna al-qawla fayattabiʿūna aḥsanahu ulāika alladhīna hadāhumu al-lahu wa-ulāika hum ulū al-albābi

dua.name: Dua for Divine Guidance
dua.significanceReason: Emphasizes listening to diverse wisdom and following the best guidance, promoting intellectual and spiritual openness.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
